text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: evam uktaH sa vipras tu dharmavyAdhena bhArata
text.ur: evam uktaḥ sa vipras tu dharmavyādhena bhārata

text.ascii: kathAm akathayad bhUyo manasaH prItivardhanIm
text.ur: kathām akathayad bhūyo manasaḥ prītivardhanīm

text.ascii: brAhmaNa
text.ur: brāhmaṇa

text.ascii: mahAbhUtAni yAny AhuH paJca dharmavidAM vara
text.ur: mahābhūtāni yāny āhuḥ pañca dharmavidāṁ vara

text.ascii: ekaikasya guNAn samyak paJcAnAm api me vada
text.ur: ekaikasya guṇān samyak pañcānām api me vada

text.ascii: vyAdha uvAca
text.ur: vyādha uvāca

text.ascii: bhUmir Apas tathA jyotir vAyur AkAzam eva ca
text.ur: bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva ca

text.ascii: guNottarANi sarvANi teSAM vakSyAmi te guNAn
text.ud: गुणोत्तराणि सर्वाणि तेषां वक्ष्यामि ते गुणान्
text.ur: guṇottarāṇi sarvāṇi teṣāṁ vakṣyāmi te guṇān

text.ascii: bhUmiH paJcaguNA brahmann udakaM ca caturguNam
text.ur: bhūmiḥ pañcaguṇā brahmann udakaṁ ca caturguṇam

text.ascii: guNAs trayas tejasi ca trayaz cAkAzavAtayoH
text.ur: guṇās trayas tejasi ca trayaś cākāśavātayoḥ

text.ascii: zabdaH sparzaz ca rUpaM ca raso gandhaz ca paJcamaH
text.ud: शब्दः स्पर्शश्च रूपं च रसो गन्धश्च पञ्चमः
text.ur: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṁ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ

text.ascii: ete guNAH paJca bhUmeH sarvebhyo guNavattarAH
text.ud: एते गुणाः पञ्च भूमेः सर्वेभ्यो गुणवत्तराः
text.ur: ete guṇāḥ pañca bhūmeḥ sarvebhyo guṇavattarāḥ

text.ascii: zabdaH sparzaz ca rUpaM ca rasaz cApi dvijottama
text.ud: शब्दः स्पर्शश्च रूपं च रसश्चापि द्विजोत्तम
text.ur: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṁ ca rasaś cāpi dvijottama

text.ascii: apAm ete guNA brahman kIrtitAs tava suvrata
text.ur: apām ete guṇā brahman kīrtitās tava suvrata

text.ascii: zabdaH sparzaz ca rUpaM ca tejaso 'tha guNAs trayaH
text.ud: शब्दः स्पर्शश्च रूपं च तेजसोऽथ गुणास्त्रयः
text.ur: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṁ ca tejaso ’tha guṇās trayaḥ

text.ascii: zabdaH sparzaz ca vAyau tu zabda AkAza eva ca
text.ud: शब्दः स्पर्शश्च वायौ तु शब्द आकाश एव च
text.ur: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca vāyau tu śabda ākāśa eva ca

text.ascii: ete paJcadaza brahman guNA bhUteSu paJcasu
text.ur: ete pañcadaśa brahman guṇā bhūteṣu pañcasu

text.ascii: vartante sarvabhUteSu yeSu lokAH pratiSThitAH
text.ur: vartante sarvabhūteṣu yeṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

text.ascii: anyonyaM nAtivartante saMpac ca bhavati dvija
text.ur: anyonyaṁ nātivartante saṁpac ca bhavati dvija

text.ascii: yadA tu viSamIbhAvam Acaranti carAcarAH
text.ur: yadā tu viṣamībhāvam ācaranti carācarāḥ

text.ascii: tadA dehI deham anyaM vyatirohati kAlataH
text.ur: tadā dehī deham anyaṁ vyatirohati kālataḥ

text.ascii: AnupUrvyA vinazyanti jAyante cAnupUrvazaH
text.ur: ānupūrvyā vinaśyanti jāyante cānupūrvaśaḥ

text.ascii: tatra tatra hi dRzyante dhAtavaH pAJcabhautikAH
text.ud: तत्र तत्र हि दृश्यन्ते धातवः पाञ्चभौतिकाः
text.ur: tatra tatra hi dr̥śyante dhātavaḥ pāñcabhautikāḥ

text.ascii: yair AvRtam idaM sarvaM jagat sthAvarajaGgamam
text.ur: yair āvr̥tam idaṁ sarvaṁ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam

text.ascii: indriyaiH sRjyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti smRtam
text.ur: indriyaiḥ sr̥jyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti smr̥tam

text.ascii: avyaktam iti vijJeyaM liGgagrAhyam atIndriyam
text.ur: avyaktam iti vijñeyaṁ liṅgagrāhyam atīndriyam

text.ascii: yathAsvaM grAhakAny eSAM zabdAdInAm imAni tu
text.ur: yathāsvaṁ grāhakāny eṣāṁ śabdādīnām imāni tu

text.ascii: indriyANi yadA dehI dhArayann iha tapyate
text.ur: indriyāṇi yadā dehī dhārayann iha tapyate

text.ascii: loke vitatam AtmAnaM lokaM cAtmani pazyati
text.ur: loke vitatam ātmānaṁ lokaṁ cātmani paśyati

text.ascii: parAvarajJaH saktaH san sarvabhUtAni pazyati
text.ur: parāvarajñaḥ saktaḥ san sarvabhūtāni paśyati

text.ascii: pazyataH sarvabhUtAni sarvAvasthAsu sarvadA
text.ur: paśyataḥ sarvabhūtāni sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā

text.ascii: brahmabhUtasya saMyogo nAzubhenopapadyate
text.ur: brahmabhūtasya saṁyogo nāśubhenopapadyate

text.ascii: jJAnamUlAtmakaM klezam ativRttasya mohajam
text.ur: jñānamūlātmakaṁ kleśam ativr̥ttasya mohajam

text.ascii: loko buddhiprakAzena jJeyamArgeNa dRzyate
text.ur: loko buddhiprakāśena jñeyamārgeṇa dr̥śyate

text.ascii: anAdinidhanaM jantum AtmayoniM sadAvyayam
text.ur: anādinidhanaṁ jantum ātmayoniṁ sadāvyayam

text.ascii: anaupamyam amUrtaM ca bhagavAn Aha buddhimAn
text.ur: anaupamyam amūrtaṁ ca bhagavān āha buddhimān

text.ascii: tapomUlam idaM sarvaM yan mAM viprAnupRcchasi
text.ur: tapomūlam idaṁ sarvaṁ yan māṁ viprānupr̥cchasi

text.ascii: indriyANy eva tat sarvaM yat svarganarakAv ubhau
text.ur: indriyāṇy eva tat sarvaṁ yat svarganarakāv ubhau

text.ascii: nigRhItavisRSTAni svargAya narakAya ca
text.ur: nigr̥hītavisr̥ṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca

text.ascii: eSa yogavidhiH kRtsno yAvad indriyadhAraNam
text.ur: eṣa yogavidhiḥ kr̥tsno yāvad indriyadhāraṇam

text.ascii: etan mUlaM hi tapasaH kRtsnasya narakasya ca
text.ud: एतन्मूलं हि तपसः कृत्स्नस्य नरकस्य च
text.ur: etan mūlaṁ hi tapasaḥ kr̥tsnasya narakasya ca

text.ascii: indriyANAM prasaGgena doSam Rcchaty asaMzayam
text.ur: indriyāṇāṁ prasaṅgena doṣam r̥cchaty asaṁśayam

text.ascii: saMniyamya tu tAny eva tataH siddhim avApnute
text.ur: saṁniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhim avāpnute

text.ascii: SaNNAm Atmani nityAnAm aizvaryaM yo 'dhigacchati
text.ur: ṣaṇṇām ātmani nityānām aiśvaryaṁ yo ’dhigacchati

text.ascii: na sa pApaiH kuto 'narthair yujyate vijitendriyaH
text.ur: na sa pāpaiḥ kuto ’narthair yujyate vijitendriyaḥ

text.ascii: rathaH zarIraM puruSasya dRSTam; AtmA niyantendriyANy Ahur azvAn
text.ur: rathaḥ śarīraṁ puruṣasya dr̥ṣṭam; ātmā niyantendriyāṇy āhur aśvān

text.ascii: tair apramattaH kuzalI sadazvair; dAntaiH sukhaM yAti rathIva dhIraH
text.ud: तैरप्रमत्तः कुशली सदश्वै;र्दान्तैः सुखं याति रथीव धीरः
text.ur: tair apramattaḥ kuśalī sadaśvair; dāntaiḥ sukhaṁ yāti rathīva dhīraḥ

text.ascii: SaNNAm Atmani nityAnAm indriyANAM pramAthinAm
text.ur: ṣaṇṇām ātmani nityānām indriyāṇāṁ pramāthinām

text.ascii: yo dhIro dhArayed razmIn sa syAt paramasArathiH
text.ur: yo dhīro dhārayed raśmīn sa syāt paramasārathiḥ

text.ascii: indriyANAM prasRSTAnAM hayAnAm iva vartmasu
text.ur: indriyāṇāṁ prasr̥ṣṭānāṁ hayānām iva vartmasu

text.ascii: dhRtiM kurvIta sArathye dhRtyA tAni jayed dhruvam
text.ud: धृतिं कुर्वीत सारथ्ये धृत्या तानि जयेद्ध्रुवम्
text.ur: dhr̥tiṁ kurvīta sārathye dhr̥tyā tāni jayed dhruvam

text.ascii: indriyANAM hi caratAM yan mano 'nuvidhIyate
text.ur: indriyāṇāṁ hi caratāṁ yan mano ’nuvidhīyate

text.ascii: tad asya harate buddhiM nAvaM vAyur ivAmbhasi
text.ur: tad asya harate buddhiṁ nāvaṁ vāyur ivāmbhasi

text.ascii: yeSu vipratipadyante SaTsu mohAt phalAgame
text.ur: yeṣu vipratipadyante ṣaṭsu mohāt phalāgame

text.ascii: teSv adhyavasitAdhyAyI vindate dhyAnajaM phalam
text.ur: teṣv adhyavasitādhyāyī vindate dhyānajaṁ phalam
